address: Xã Ninh Khang, Thành phố Hoa Lư, Tỉnh Ninh Bình
thought:
**Finding the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Ninh Khang, Thành phố Hoa Lư, Tỉnh Ninh Bình"**

Okay, so I've got a request to determine the new administrative unit (ward) for the old address "Xã Ninh Khang, Thành phố Hoa Lư, Tỉnh Ninh Bình." My process will involve a meticulous check of province mergers and ward re-organizations, referencing official resolutions.

First, I need to identify the initial province and ward.  It's clear that we're dealing with "Tỉnh Ninh Bình" (Ninh Binh Province) and "Xã Ninh Khang" (Ninh Khang Commune). The first crucial step is to verify if there were any province mergers. Checking the relevant document (60-NQ/TW), I see that "Tỉnh Ninh Bình" remains unchanged, so no province name adjustments are needed.

Now, I'll focus on ward-level changes. I have to search through "Other Resolutions" for any mention of "Ninh Khang". The important thing here is to verify that the resolution refers to Ninh Binh province.

I examined Resolution 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15, specific to Tỉnh Ninh Bình. And lo and behold, Line 123 of this resolution is the key. It states that "Xã Ninh Khang," along with other communes and wards, is merged to form the new ward called "Phường Hoa Lư" (Hoa Lu Ward).

Just to be absolutely sure, I've noticed the reference to resolution 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15. It also mentions "Ninh Khang". However, that resolution concerns "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" (Thanh Hoa Province) , so it's irrelevant. It's really important to keep provinces straight!

The final step is to validate the newly found ward details against a "New wards" list.  I found the entry confirming "Phường Hoa Lư" with the code "14329," and it's within "Tỉnh Ninh Bình," perfectly aligning with my earlier finding.

Therefore, the final output will be constructed with "citation" coming from line 123 of the mentioned resolution and the corresponding header, "confidence" labeled as "high" due to the direct matching and validation. My final answer should reflect this, with the new "ward_code" of "14329" and "ward_name" of "Phường Hoa Lư" within the confirmed province, "Tỉnh Ninh Bình."

citation.header: 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Ninh Bình
citation.line: 123. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các phường Ninh Mỹ, Ninh Khánh, Đông Thành, Tân Thành, Vân Giang, Nam Thành, Nam Bình, Bích Đào và các xã Ninh Khang, Ninh Nhất, Ninh Tiến thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Hoa Lư.
